channel.title: Please help!
channel.description: i jusst made my owqn server. but i dont know how to give ppl who log in immediatly get 2 mil and full dharoks. where do i write the code? and how do i make NPC's?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 21, 2007, 08:29:23 AM[/size][hr]and by the way hwo do i make the admin crown near me?

item.title: Please help!

item.title: Please help!
item.dc:creator: @kiev kiev
item.description:
@kiev wrote:

ok never remove a ; for one
what you do is see this? playerEquipment[playerHat]=-1;?
change the playerEquipment[playerHat]=-1;
to a item number such as for dharok helm i think it is 1149 so it will be

playerEquipment[playerHat]=1149;

item.title: Please help!

playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1;
